participant_1.background:
I like to play outside with my brothers on the Fourth of July.
i work for a small , family owned restaurant.
My longest relationship was four years and I'm not sure if I'm ready for another one.
i have taken formal music lessons since i was 5.
my favorite class is painting.

participant_2.background:
I'm interested in learning more about how to cope with my wife's terminal cancer.
I sometimes spend hours practicing bird calls, even though I'm not very good at it.
I love spending time with my dog on Christmas.
My greatest challenge has been balancing the demands of my family and my career, but I'm grateful that I've been able to find a way to do both.
i vacation in florida every winter.

content.text: Hi there, what are you up to today?
It's a beautiful day, I'm going to spend some time outside practicing my bird calls.
That sounds like fun, I've always wanted to learn how to do that.
It's actually not that difficult, but it can be frustrating at first.
I'm sure I would be terrible at it, but I could give it a try.
Well, if you ever get the chance, I would recommend it. It's a fun way to connect with nature.
I'll keep that in mind, thank you for the tip. What else do you like to do for fun?
I love to spend time with my dog, he's a great companion. I also enjoy painting, it's a great way to relax and de-stress.
I love painting too! It's so therapeutic.
I'm glad to hear that, it's definitely one of my favorite hobbies.
I'm curious, what's your favorite thing to paint?
I like to paint landscapes, I find them really relaxing to paint.
Me too, I love the way the colors and textures can really bring a landscape to life.
Yes, it's so much fun to play with different colors and brush strokes.
I'm glad I met you, you seem like a really cool person.
Thanks, you too! I'm glad we had this chance to chat.
